{"name": "Cardington Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "A – G Shop the 1st Wednesday of the month
H – L Shop the 2nd Wednesday of the month
M – R Shop the 3rd Wednesday of the month
S – Z Shop the 4th Wednesday of the month
The Pantry will be closed if there is a Level 2 or 3 snow emergency.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.cardingtonfoodpantry.org/contact.html", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "128 Flint Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Cardington", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "43315", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.4994461, "longitude": -82.8970752}, "phones": [{"number": "(419) 408-4201", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}]}
